downfall-rebalance:WorldOfGoo.NAME: World of Goo
downfall-rebalance:WorldOfGoo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, add a Slimed Status to your discard pile.

downfall-rebalance:Hexed.NAME: Hexed
downfall-rebalance:Hexed.DESCRIPTION: Start with a Velvet Choker. When you draw a card, it becomes Ethereal.

downfall-rebalance:Jewelcrafting.NAME: Jewelcrafting
downfall-rebalance:Jewelcrafting.DESCRIPTION: Start with two copies of Exploit Gem and a Rhapsody Co. Mining Pick.
